com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.ui.handler
Interface IInterfaceUIHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractInterfaceUIHandler
public interface IInterfaceUIHandler

This interface must be implemented by all interface ui handlers.

Nested Class Summary
static interface IInterfaceUIHandler.IInterfaceDescriptionProvider
          The IInterfaceUIHandler.IInterfaceDescriptionProvider maps an interface object to an optional image and optional text string used to display the element in the viewer's control.

Method Detail

createNewInterfaceObject

java.lang.Object createNewInterfaceObject(org.eclipse.core.resources.IContainer defaultLocation,
                                          org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell)
                                          throws com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException,
                                                 com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.InvalidOperationException,
                                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
Creates a new interface object to be used by an SCA interface. Also, the IUIContext is optionally used by this method to display the corresponding wizard used to create the new interface object.

Parameters:
defaultLocation - the default container to use when creating the interface
shell - callback object that the handler can use to obtain additional information needed to create the interface object
Returns:
the new interface object
Throws:
com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException - An unexpected exception occurred.
com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.InvalidOperationException - The interface object cannot be created.
java.lang.InterruptedException - The caller did not provide a callback object needed by the handler, or the callback request was canceled or aborted.

open

void open(com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.sca.Interface interfaceObj)
          throws com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException,
                 com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.InvalidOperationException
This method opens a registered editor for the given interface type.

Parameters:
interfaceObj - the interface to open
Throws:
com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException - An unexpected exception occurred.
com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.InvalidOperationException - The interface cannot be opened.

getInterfaceObjects

java.lang.Object[] getInterfaceObjects(org.eclipse.wst.common.core.search.scope.SearchScope searchScope,
                                       org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                       throws com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException
Returns an array of Object representing all interface objects found within the given search scope. The handler determines how it will use the search scope. Depending on the interface type being sought, the handler may look at a single project or folder or look in the workspace or in a project's classpath.

The objects returned by this method must be supported as the argument to the AbstractInterfaceHandler.canCreateInterfaceFor(Object interfaceObj) method.

Parameters:
searchScope - SearchScope instance
monitor - IProgressMonitor
Returns:
an array of Object
Throws:
com.ibm.ccl.soa.core.saf.exception.SAFException - The search cannot be completed.

getInterfaceDescriptionProvider

IInterfaceUIHandler.IInterfaceDescriptionProvider getInterfaceDescriptionProvider()
This method returns the handler's instance of IInterfaceUIHandler.IInterfaceDescriptionProvider. The provider is reponsible for generating label information for objects returned by getInterfaceObjects(SearchScope, IProgressMonitor).

Returns:
the IInterfaceUIHandler.IInterfaceDescriptionProvider instance
